activities:
Generally, Internap uses the information, and other information Internap may have about you, to provide the services or information you have requested, to personalize your experience on this website, to provide customer support, to improve this website, to enforce Internap’s agreements and policies, to resolve disputes, to improve our marketing and promotional efforts, and to design new services for your future use.
Internap may also use the information to notify you about new services or offers that Internap may have available, or to provide news about Internap.

Internap may, from time to time, contact you on behalf of external business partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you. In those cases, your personal information (e-mail, name, address, telephone number) is not transferred to the third party.
contacttitle1: Vice President Internal Audit and Compliance
corpofftitle1: Vice President Internal Audit and Compliance
